name: Consultation
description: A comprehensive dental evaluation to assess oral health and discuss treatment options.

name: Oral Prophylaxis / Cleaning
description: A professional cleaning to remove plaque, tartar, and stains from teeth.

name: Tooth Filling
description: A procedure to restore a decayed or damaged tooth using a filling material.

name: Tooth Extraction
description: The removal of a tooth from its socket due to decay, damage, or overcrowding.

name: Wisdom Tooth Removal
description: Surgical extraction of impacted or problematic wisdom teeth.

name: Mouthguard
description: A custom-fitted device to protect teeth during sports or to prevent grinding.

name: Root Canal Treatment
description: A procedure to remove infected pulp from a tooth and seal it to prevent further infection.

name: Complete Denture
description: A removable set of artificial teeth for patients missing all their natural teeth, providing improved function and aesthetics.

name: Partial Denture
description: A removable dental appliance for patients missing some teeth, designed to fit around existing natural teeth to restore appearance and function.

name: Retainers
description: Custom-made devices worn post-orthodontic treatment to maintain teeth alignment and prevent shifting.

name: Braces
description: Orthodontic devices used to correct misaligned teeth and jaw positions, improving bite and overall dental health.

name: Tooth Whitening
description: A cosmetic procedure that lightens teeth and removes stains and discoloration for a brighter smile.

name: Dental Sealant
description: A protective coating applied to the chewing surfaces of back teeth, preventing cavities and decay.

name: Periapical Radiograph
description: An X-ray image showing the whole tooth and surrounding bone, useful for diagnosing dental issues like infections or fractures.
